verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:35
verses.text: He teacheth my hands to war; so that a bow of steel is broken by mine arms.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:36
verses.text: Thou hast also given me the shield of thy salvation: and thy gentleness hath made me great.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:37
verses.text: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me; so that my feet did not slip.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:38
verses.text: I have pursued mine enemies, and destroyed them; and turned not again until I had consumed them.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:39
verses.text: And I have consumed them, and wounded them, that they could not arise: yea, they are fallen under my feet.
